After saving a prisoner from drowning as a result of Hurricane Katrina, the detective Terence McDonagh (Nicolas Cage) is promoted to lieutenant. Seriously bruised with the back, he becomes dependent on painkillers to endure the pain. A year later is addicted to Vicodin and cocaine, but continues to work on behalf of the law. When a family of African immigrants is murdered, he is assigned to the case and goes in search of the killer.
